title: Selection of sorting types by scheduling
content: Definition: Sorting typeThis is how you display different information when you make your schedules: The employeesOther additional informationThe presence on the floorWhen to use sorting? When you make your schedules, you can work to display the information that interests you at all times.This article shows you all the ways to display the information need.How to use sort types?Employee displayYou can have a default sort by going to your preferences. You can classify employees by:Years of service: classification by seniority dateFile sort order: classification according to an order that you can customize in the file of each employeeEmployee numberAlphabetical orderAccording to classification by employee fileGo to the Employee file,  Click on Work Parameters, in the section Parameters,Modify the corresponding box.With a group of employeesIt is a personalized filter with a filter that is made for you. Build it and modify it as needed. You can use it in schedules as well as for timesheets.Read the full article for more information: Employee groupViewing additional informationTotalsYou have the total hours planned in the schedules:At the end of each line for each employeeFolding the day for the personPassing the mouse over the date for each dayMouse over Total to display the total for the periodIn the top right corner of the grid: for the position and for the departmentIf you are in Schedules by Position, you can have the total for the entire department, for each position and for each employee.Stat. Holidays and vacation hours are not calculated in the schedule. You will see the hours in the timesheet approval.If you want to know in advance the calculation of stat. holidays, use the report: Stat. Holidays Calculation. Choose the stat. holiday in Start Date.If you want to know in advance how vacation is calculated, you can contact your Administrator.TasksYou can view the tasks by clicking on   on the bottom of Total.Presence display on the floorDisplay the information on who will be on the floor for a day by clicking on the day that interests you. Training not be included in this table.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
